title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for the tangent line

One point is earned for the approximation

f(1) = 15, f'(1) = 8

An equation for the tangent line is

y = 15 + 8(x - 1)

f(1.4) ≈ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaeyisISlaaa@37A7@ 15 + 8(1.4 - 1) = 18.2
